about_the_game:
The Story


Discover the adventure of a boy from a small neighborhood who has to sneak into the surrounding houses to steal precious items. With vigilant owners and yards full of traps, you'll have to hide, teleport, and become invisible to escape with the money and valuable items.

Your mission is to achieve the goals without getting caught by the vigilant homeowners. Be careful and avoid any suspicious behavior that could attract attention. You need to make sure the owners are busy or asleep before you start searching the houses.

This captivating game offers you a unique gaming experience, with high-quality graphics and a variety of difficulty levels to challenge your gaming skills. In addition, every object in the house can be moved, and this gives you a one in four chance of discovering a box with supernatural powers that can help you in your adventure.

This game is not just about stealing objects. There are also a series of hidden boxes that contain fascinating superpowers. You can become invisible, jump twice in a single move, or even teleport. But again, be careful of the homeowners - if they catch you while he's trying to teleport, they might give him a strange look!

Ultimately, your goal is to be as fast and discreet as possible while collecting valuable items and additional powers. Each house has its own challenges and obstacles, so make sure you're ready for anything. Are you ready to join the adventurous little boy in the game of your life?

Download the game now and start your own journey of theft and adventure in this picturesque neighborhood!

Features:

  • Ability to sneak into houses and steal valuable items.
  • Vigilant homeowners who pose a challenge to the player's success.
  • Various levels of difficulty to choose from.
  • Dynamic, high-quality graphics.
  • Ability to move objects around in the house, potentially revealing boxes with supernatural powers.
  • Special abilities, such as invisibility and teleportation, that can be unlocked by finding these boxes.
  • Adaptive AI for the homeowners, who become more challenging as the player progresses through the game.
  • We've added 15 exciting new trophies for you to unlock! Test your skills and discover new challenges as you.
    Keyboard Controls

name: Oli One: Sneak in

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I3
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTS 450 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 7.0 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 650 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Discover the adventure of a boy from a small neighborhood who has to sneak into the surrounding houses to steal precious items. With vigilant owners and yards full of traps, you'll have to hide, teleport, and become invisible to escape with the money and valuable items.
